title: Congress could codify privacy rights with a bipartisan bill
itunes:title: Congress could codify privacy rights with a bipartisan bill
itunes:author: Marketplace / Marketplace Tech Staff
description: It’s crunch time on Capitol Hill. Congress’ August recess starts in just a few weeks, so lawmakers are hoping to finish up some work before they skip town. One item of business with increased urgency for many is codifying privacy rights. Last week, President Biden signed an executive order on the issue, and some lawmakers in Congress hope they can do more to protect privacy in the coming months with the American Data Privacy and Protection Act. Marketplace’s Kimberly Adams speaks with Cristiano Lima, a reporter at The Washington Post.
